alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 11 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Flood Watch for a portion of central Idaho, including the following areas, Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin, Sun Valley Region, and Wood River Foothills. * From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening * Moderate to heavy rain combined with upper level snow melt may produce sudden rises on area rivers and streams. * Mudslides and rockslides in mountainous areas are possible.
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on current forecasts. You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
